name: archaeologist-service
description: Service used to perform jobs in the Sarcophagus ecosystem

scripts.pk: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=./build node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node build/src/scripts/priv-key-tool.js
scripts.cli:install: npm run build && chmod +x build/src/cli/run.js && npm link
scripts.start: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=./build node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node build/src/index.js
scripts.start:local: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=./build node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node build/src/scripts/run_local/index.js
scripts.start:debug: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=libp2p:* NODE_PATH=./build node build/src/index.js
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./build node -r dotenv/config --experimental-specifier-resolution=node build/src/test/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env
